snippet: MENDELOW--Steven. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the death of our longtime, devoted member, Steven Mendelow. We will miss his caring devotion to family, friends and our synagogue. Our heartfelt condolences are extended to his beloved wife, Nancy, children, Pam and Cara and grandchildren, Michael, Alex and Jessica. Robert N. Levine, DD, Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
